kpi.name: M8017C9

kpi_info.title: Failed Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN per neighbor cell relationship
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of failed Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN per neighbor cell relationship. UPDATED: Updated when Inter System Handover fails due to expiration of guarding timer TS1RELOCoverall. This counter is updated for the source cell of the handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN per neighbor cell relationship
